attributes.action: allow off road motorcycling in virtually if not completely un used wasteland/fields etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want to make use of un used land to have a bit of fun with friends and our children,there are hardly any places to use off road bikes,the few tracks are bursting at the seems with riders  overcrowding the track which becomes very dangerous (i was hit by another rider,spent months in hospital and almost died as a result),stand by any track and you'll see plenty of injuries occuring regulary,many fatal.this doesn't happen on open waste ground,people with varying abilities arent bunched together on tight intimidating and difficult tracks,kids would have the chance to safely learn a rewarding and commited sport instead of hanging about streets collecting asbo's.i dont like listening to 30,000+ football fans screaming from the ground near my house or the traffic,crime and drunken anti social behaviour that stems from matches most saturdays and wednesday nights but i've had to put up with it for all my life.why cant a few people put up with a little bike noise?
